clinical_study.brief_title: A Clinical Study to Determine the Safety and Effectiveness of Dentinal Hypersensitivity Treatment With Two Different Toothbrushes

brief_summary.textblock: This study will determine the effects toothbrush type (power or manual) has on the safety and effectiveness of professional dentinal hypersensitivity treatment with a marketed oxalate-containing solution.

primary_outcome.measure: Dentin Sensitivity measured by Schiff Index

secondary_outcome.measure: Dentin Sensitivity measured by Visual Analog Scale
